name: NepaliCalendar
0:
”Alexa, ask nepali calendar what day is today”
”Alexa, ask nepali calendar to convert june 12th 2008 to Nepali date”
”Alexa, ask nepali calendar to convert tomorrow to English Date”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nepali calendar
des:
This is an Alexa skill that can responds back Nepali Date in Bikram Sambat. It can also convert Nepali Date to English Date and vice versa. 

You can ask:
"Alexa, ask Nepali calendar what day is today", it will respond back the equivalent Nepali date.

You can also ask Nepali calendar to convert between dates.
"Alexa, ask nepali calendar to convert june 12th 2008 to Nepali date". it will responds back the equivalent Nepali Date for given English Date.

You can also ask to convert Nepali to English date.
"Alexa, ask nepali calendar to convert tomorrow to English Date". it will responds back with Nepali Date which was converted to English Date. This feature has limitation as Alexa can't understand Nepali Date So, you will have to refer English date while giving Nepali Date as input. As long as, you mention "to English Date" it'll convert whatever date it gets to English assuming provided input is Nepali Date.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
